text: Isipɨ fɨli tɨbɨ hɨsɨŋ agɨlaŋ Isɨlaelɨ hɨdɨlɨ agɨladɨ aba lɨbɨsɨlɨvavɨci lɨhalɨha sɨbaŋ iaha uavɨmi. Sɨmɨŋ akuaba akuaba agɨladɨ ma sɨhuva via uavɨmi. Maci huhɨla huhɨla hɨsɨŋ isɨ aba abavɨhadami agadɨ maci hɨvɨ ma mɨŋamɨjiavɨci mɨguci eŋalavɨla via uavɨmi. Maci sakɨvakɨva laci via uavɨla hɨlanavɨmi.
